Welcome to the location to sign up for Summer League 2021. If it is no longer summer, then this is the wrong location.

If you want to see more details about how the league is going to be run, choose the [League Info](https://triad-ultimate.netlify.app/league.html) drop down



# Sign up Steps  


1. Send money to Triad Ultimate via paypal or venmo  
    * Venmo >>  
    * PayPal >> 
1. Please fill out the survey form below to help us understand your relative skill level.  
1. Wait.
    * The captains will be gathering to figure out how to best set up teams to ensure we all have a fun time this summer.
